Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence and functionality. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, as it represents years of innovation and dedication to quality. We are offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $750000. This opportunity is not only a chance to acquire a remarkable piece but also to benefit from its unparalleled features that could potentially transform your experience with [product category]. We believe in making luxury accessible and hope that you will consider this offer to secure a piece that is both valuable and meaningful. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this masterpiece into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
